entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Abbotsford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Abbotsford Airport 11:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 6.1°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: A few showers ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm except 25 mm near the mountains. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing before morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening then becoming light near midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.summary: Periods of rain. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
